name: Infested (School for Games)
description:
The Game Is a 2.5D Jump and Run Siedescroller. Where the Main Protagonist Clover is set out on REVENGE.

Plot

Once on a bright morning Clover was having a nice Picnic with their best friends. When suddenly a big meteorite crashed down. Out of that meteorite came an EVIL CRYSTAL that KILLED Clovers friends. Luckily Clover Survived, but when they woke up they realised that part of the Crystal fused with their head. Giving Clover the Ability to summon Crystals. And now they're on a Rampage to get Revenge on their friends. But its not going to be easy because as it turns out the EVIL CRYSTAL turned all of the friendly insects bad, morphing their appearance and their abilites, making them hostile towards Clover.

Origin

The game got created at the School 4 Games as a 1st Semester project.

The Team

Colin Burmeister - 3D Artist

Ekrem-Adrian Bierut - Game Design, Sound Design

Johannes Laarman - 3D Artist, Animations, Level Design

Karl Nehring - Gameplay Programming, UI Programming

Lutz Angemeier - Composer

Michel Kramer - 3D Artist, 2D Artist

Nils Angemeier - Production, Level Design, Game Design

Patryk Olejnik - Gameplay Programming, AI Programming
